Hi,

On Tue, Jan 22, 2008 at 03:04:59PM -0000, nfoscarini wrote:
> I remember getting a nullpointerexeception when I first started using
> 1.12.1
> 
> The problem was solved when I used one of the sample profiles as a
> template for my crawl job.

I copied the default profile and modified that to use the
AdaptiveRevisitFrontier (following the directions in the manual to add
in the ChangeEvaluator and the WaitEvaluator). I couldn't seem to find
any other sample profiles, in the heritrix distribution, or by googling.
Could you point me to them?

Thanks,
-Colin.
